comments: 729 = 3^6 = 9^3 = 27^2.Length of the period is 81 =9^2 (see example for all 81 digits of the period).Period in the form of 9X9 square table:1, 3, 7, 1, 7, 4, 2, 1, 1,2, 4, 8, 2, 8, 5, 3, 2, 2,3, 5, 9, 3, 9, 6, 4, 3, 3,4, 7, 0, 5, 0, 7, 5, 4, 4,5, 8, 1, 6, 1, 8, 6, 5, 5,6, 9, 2, 7, 2, 9, 7, 6, 6,8, 0, 3, 8, 4, 0, 8, 7, 7,9, 1, 4, 9, 5, 1, 9, 8, 9,0, 2, 6, 0, 6, 3, 1, 0, 0.Note that each column consists of 9 consecutive (cyclically repeated) digits out of 10. The missing digits in columns from left to right are {7, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 0, 9, 8}, which form also a cycle of 9 out of 10 consecutive digits in reverse order, all digits except 1. - _Alexander Adamchuk_, Dec 28 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
